attributes.action: Review the current guidelines for weddings / receptions and make them viable.
attributes.additional_details:
Work with wedding venues to reduce the risk of further businesses going in to administration. People need to be able to get together and celebrate after such a horrible year. Weddings have been planned for years and already postponed once or cancelled. The new guidelines do not amount to allowing what anyone would call a wedding. 
Let’s get the system working.
Schools, shops, restaurants, pubs are all open again so not being able to eat or drink following a wedding doesn’t seem to make any sense
attributes.background: The current guidelines are extremely limiting and will cripple the wedding industry. I also believe that people have the right to make a choice and be able to celebrate what is for some a once in a lifetime event. Increase in allowed numbers and receptions to be allowed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329363
